Detailed Description

Memory saving traversal of a fits image.

This class is intended to access an image in a fits file, but only a slice of the image will reside in memory at a time. To be used when many images have to be accessed at the same time, in parallel (see FitsParallelSlices), or maybe to traverse a very big image.
